name: Granulator
description: Granular synthesis engine using live audio or samples from SD card. Spawns grains controlled by notes (CV/Gate, MIDI, I2C) or internal drones. Features various grain parameter controls with mean/spread for randomization.

specifications.name: Max buffer size
specifications.description: The maximum size of the recording buffer.

parameters.name: Input gain
parameters.description: Gain applied to the audio being recorded (does not affect the dry signal).

parameters.name: Dry gain
parameters.description: Level of the input signal in the output mix.

parameters.name: Granulator gain
parameters.description: Level of the granulator signal in the output mix.

parameters.name: Input feedback
parameters.description: Feedback around the audio buffer when recording (echo effect on input).

parameters.name: Main feedback
parameters.description: Feedback of granulator output into the audio buffer when recording.

parameters.name: Normalize
parameters.description: If enabled, the overall volume of the grain cloud is lowered according to how many grains are active.

parameters.name: Record
parameters.description: Enables recording into the buffer.

parameters.name: Buffer size
parameters.description: The audio buffer size in milliseconds.

parameters.name: Record fade
parameters.description: Fade duration applied when starting/stopping recording to avoid clicks.

parameters.name: Shape
parameters.description: The grain envelope/window shape.

parameters.name: Spawn mode
parameters.description: How grains are spawned.

parameters.name: Rate mean
parameters.description: The average time between new grains being spawned.

parameters.name: Rate spread
parameters.description: Variation in the spawn rate (% of Rate mean).

parameters.name: Size mean
parameters.description: The average grain size. 0 uses note pitch to calculate cycle duration.

parameters.name: Size spread
parameters.description: Variation in grain size (% of Size mean).

parameters.name: Pitch mean
parameters.description: Average grain pitch shift (semitones), added to note's pitch CV.

parameters.name: Pitch spread
parameters.description: Variation in grain pitch shift.

parameters.name: Pan mean
parameters.description: Average grain pan position.

parameters.name: Pan spread
parameters.description: Variation in grain pan.

parameters.name: Delay mean
parameters.description: Average grain delay (position in buffer). Unit (% or ms) depends on 'Delay unit' parameter.

parameters.name: Delay spread
parameters.description: Variation in grain delay (% of buffer size).

parameters.name: Reverse
parameters.description: Probability that a grain will be played backwards.

parameters.name: Grain limit
parameters.description: Arbitrary limit on the number of simultaneous grains.

parameters.name: Natural pitch
parameters.description: Natural pitch of the audio (MIDI note number for original pitch playback).

parameters.name: Pitch quantize
parameters.description: Quantizes random pitch deviation to musical intervals.

parameters.name: Opacity
parameters.description: Percentage of grains normally spawned that are actually spawned.

parameters.name: LFO depth
parameters.description: Depth of the LFO affecting grain delay (% of buffer size).

parameters.name: LFO speed
parameters.description: Speed of the grain delay LFO (relative to buffer size, 196=1x speed).

parameters.name: LFO shape
parameters.description: Sets the LFO shape.

parameters.name: Attack time
parameters.description: The note envelope attack time (exponential scale, 100ms to 30s).

parameters.name: Release time
parameters.description: The note envelope release time (exponential scale, 100ms to 30s).

parameters.name: Env -> opacity
parameters.description: Amount note envelope affects note opacity.

parameters.name: Env -> level
parameters.description: Amount note envelope affects note level (volume).

parameters.name: Veloc -> level
parameters.description: Amount note velocity affects note level (volume).

parameters.name: Veloc -> delay
parameters.description: Amount note velocity affects grain delay.

parameters.name: Pitch -> pitch
parameters.description: Amount note pitch affects grain pitch (100% = normal tracking).

parameters.name: Pitch -> delay
parameters.description: Amount note pitch affects grain delay.

parameters.name: Drone 1 pitch
parameters.description: MIDI note number for Drone 1.

parameters.name: Drone 1 enable
parameters.description: Enables (gates) Drone 1.

parameters.name: Drone 1 opacity
parameters.description: Opacity of Drone 1.

parameters.name: Drone 1 level
parameters.description: Level (volume) of Drone 1.

parameters.name: Drone 2 pitch
parameters.description: MIDI note number for Drone 2.

parameters.name: Drone 2 enable
parameters.description: Enables (gates) Drone 2.

parameters.name: Drone 2 opacity
parameters.description: Opacity of Drone 2.

parameters.name: Drone 2 level
parameters.description: Level (volume) of Drone 2.

parameters.name: Drone 3 pitch
parameters.description: MIDI note number for Drone 3.

parameters.name: Drone 3 enable
parameters.description: Enables (gates) Drone 3.

parameters.name: Drone 3 opacity
parameters.description: Opacity of Drone 3.

parameters.name: Drone 3 level
parameters.description: Level (volume) of Drone 3.

parameters.name: MIDI channel
parameters.description: The MIDI channel to listen on.

parameters.name: MPE channels
parameters.description: Controls how the algorithm will respond to MPE.

parameters.name: I2C channel
parameters.description: Sets the I2C channel.

parameters.name: Bend range
parameters.description: The MIDI pitch bend range.

parameters.name: Delay unit
parameters.description: Determines whether Delay mean/spread parameters work in % or ms.

parameters.name: Left input
parameters.description: The left audio input bus.

parameters.name: Right input
parameters.description: The right audio input bus.

parameters.name: Left output
parameters.description: The left audio output bus.

parameters.name: Right output
parameters.description: The right audio output bus.

parameters.name: Output mode
parameters.description: The standard Add/Replace mode selector as described above.

parameters.name: Delay mean input
parameters.description: Input bus to control grain delay (5V = 100% buffer size).

parameters.name: Delay mean sampled
parameters.description: If enabled, Delay mean input is sampled once at note start, else continuously per grain.

input_ports.name: Delay Mean CV
input_ports.description: CV input for grain delay mean.
